text: Ursula "Ulla" Thielemann (born 18 January 1960 in Hanau) was a field hockey international from West Germany, who won the silver medal with her national squad at the 1984 Summer Olympics in Los Angeles. She was the first goalkeeper in women's field hockey to wear a helmet. ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1960 births Category:Living people Category:German female field hockey players Category:Olympic field hockey players of West Germany Category:Olympic silver medalists for West Germany Category:Olympic medalists in field hockey Category:Field hockey players at the 1984 Summer Olympics Category:Medalists at the 1984 Summer Olympics
title: Ursula Thielemann
